model

Class CycleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CycleHandler

  • public final class CycleHandler
extends Object
    Singleton class that handle the cycles of an LPS framework. Only called by the static method getInstance().
    Author:
    Albex
    See Also:
    getInstance()

      • CycleHandler

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final CycleHandler getInstance()
        This is the method to get an instance of the class.
        Returns:
        the only instance of the class CycleHandler.

      • setState

        public void setState(CycleState NEW_STATE)
        Setter method for the state. Normally only called by classes implementing the State interface.
        Parameters:
        NEW_STATE - the next step of the cycle.

      • handlerMethod

        public void handlerMethod(String NAME)
                   throws CloneNotSupportedException
        Handler method called at each step of a cycle.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        CloneNotSupportedException

      • getEvents

        public Stack<SimpleSentence> getEvents()
        Getter method of the events attribute.
        Returns:
        the list of events triggered during the last cycle.

      • setEvents

        Setter method of the events attribute.
        Parameters:
